metadata.description: Comprehensive catalog of WhatsApp message templates for dental clinic website sales
metadata.usage: Reference guide for all message templates organized by sales stage and use case

templates.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Initial Preview Message
templates.use_case: First message to send with preview image
templates.content:
Doctor, I made a modern homepage preview for your clinic.
It builds trust for high-ticket treatments like implants and aligners.

Here is the sample üëá

templates.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Follow-Up Question
templates.use_case: Create urgency and get commitment to next step
templates.content: Do you want me to create a full homepage version for you? I can share it for free.

templates.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Follow-Up (2 Hours)
templates.content:
Doctor, did you get a chance to see the preview?
I can upgrade your high-ticket treatment pages too ‚Äî implants, veneers, aligners.

templates.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Next Morning Follow-Up
templates.content:
Doctor, one quick question:
Do you want a premium or simple website style?

I can show you both options with your clinic photos.

templates.title: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Soft Close (Day 3)
templates.content:
Doctor, I'll close your preview file today. 
Should I keep it ready if you plan to upgrade this month?

sales_sequence.description: After doctor says YES to full homepage

templates.title: ‚úÖ Step 1: Confirm Direction
templates.condition: Doctor says yes to full homepage
templates.content:
Great doctor! Before I prepare the full homepage, may I ask:

Do you prefer a clean white premium style,
or a modern teal/blue dental theme?

templates.title: ‚úÖ Step 2: Get Treatment Focus
templates.content:
Perfect. I'll design the layout based on that.

Quick question ‚Äî which high-ticket treatments do you want to highlight?
Implants, aligners, veneers, or smile makeovers?

templates.title: ‚úÖ Step 3: Introduce Pricing
templates.content:
Got it doctor. That helps me tailor the design exactly for your clinic.

Before I proceed, I'll share the pricing options so you can choose the right package.

templates.title: üí∞ Step 4: Send Pricing
templates.content:
Here are the options, doctor:

‚úî Starter Clinic Website ‚Äì ‚Çπ20,000
(Homepage + 2 Pages + WhatsApp Booking)

‚úî Growth High-Ticket Clinic ‚Äì ‚Çπ35,000
(Homepage + 1 detailed Treatment Page + Gallery + Reviews)
+ ‚Çπ2,000 per additional treatment page

‚úî Premium Implants/Aligners Clinic ‚Äì ‚Çπ60,000
(Full premium site + copywriting + gallery + booking setup)

Which one suits you best?

templates.title: üîí Step 5: Close & Get Advance
templates.content:
Perfect doctor. I'll start designing today.

I normally take a 40% advance to begin work.
How would you like to proceed? (UPI / Bank Transfer?)

templates.title: ‚ùå "Send full homepage first"
templates.timing: When doctor asks for free work
templates.condition: Doctor wants full site before paying
templates.use_case: Protect your time and set boundaries
templates.content:
Sure doctor, I'll prepare the homepage once the project is confirmed.

The sample I showed was just a preview.
For the full homepage, treatment pages, gallery and booking setup,
Once we start, you'll get a fully customized modern design.

Which package are you considering?
I can guide you based on your clinic needs.

templates.title: ‚ùå "Too expensive"
templates.timing: When doctor says price is high
templates.content:
I understand doctor.

May I ask ‚Äî how many implant or aligner enquiries do you get monthly?

Even 2-3 extra cases from a professional website pays for itself.
Our sites are designed specifically to bring high-ticket patients, not just visitors.

templates.title: ‚ùå "I'll think about it"
templates.content:
Of course doctor, take your time.

Just so you know ‚Äî the preview I made is reserved for you this week.
After that, I'll move it to my portfolio for other clinics.

Shall I keep it on hold for you?

templates.title: ‚ùå "Already have website"
templates.content:
That's great doctor!

May I check it quickly? I can suggest 2-3 quick improvements that bring more implant/aligner enquiries.

(Then point out: slow speed, no WhatsApp CTA, unclear treatments, etc.)

templates.title: ‚ùå "Let me ask my partner"
templates.use_case: Get access to real decision maker
templates.content:
Sure doctor!

Shall I send the preview and pricing to them directly?
Or would you like me to explain the options on a quick call with both of you?

follow_up_timeline.description: When they don't reply after preview

templates.title: ‚è±Ô∏è 2 Hours After Silence
templates.content:
Doctor, sharing 2 sample homepage styles for reference üëá
(white premium vs blue modern dental)

Once you select the style, I can guide you to the right package.

templates.title: üåÖ Next Morning (8-9 AM)
templates.content:
Good morning doctor üôÇ
Did you get a chance to think about which package suits your clinic?
I can help you choose based on your implants/aligners focus.

templates.title: ‚è≥ 48 Hours Later
templates.use_case: Offer quick call to help decide
templates.content:
Doctor, just checking in again.
If you want, I can walk you through the 3 package differences in 2 minutes.
It will help you decide faster.

templates.title: üóìÔ∏è Day 4-5: Soft Close
templates.content:
Doctor, I'll be closing your preview file today.
If you plan to upgrade the website this month, I can keep your slot open.
Just let me know üôÇ

templates.title: üìÅ Day 7-10: Archive Message
templates.use_case: Graceful exit while leaving door open
templates.content:
Doctor, I'll archive this chat for now.
Whenever you wish to upgrade the clinic website for better implant/aligner conversions,
just message me ‚Äî I'll be happy to help üôÇ

call_scripts.description: What to say when calling doctors

templates.title: üìû Call After 24-48h Silence
templates.timing: When they viewed but didn't reply
templates.use_case: Direct call to close the deal
templates.content:
Hello doctor, hope I'm not disturbing you.
Just following up because I wanted to confirm the homepage style
(white premium vs blue modern dental)
before I keep your project slot open.

[Pause for response]

Between the ‚Çπ20k, ‚Çπ35k and ‚Çπ60k plans,
which one are you leaning towards?

templates.title: üìû Quick 1-Minute Call
templates.timing: When they were positive but busy
templates.content:
Doctor just a quick call, 1 minute only ‚Äî wanted to confirm homepage style and your package preference.

[Keep it short and direct]

[Ask: Which package works for you - Starter/Growth/Premium?]

templates.title: üìû When They Said 'Call Later'
templates.content:
Hello doctor, you mentioned I could call at this time.

I've prepared 2 homepage style options for your clinic.
Shall I send them to your WhatsApp now?

[Get WhatsApp and send samples]

[Then discuss package options]

templates.title: üìû Cold Call Script (New Lead)
templates.use_case: Initial cold call to get WhatsApp
templates.content:
Hello, this is [Your Name]. Am I speaking with Dr. [Name]?

[Wait]

Doctor, I make modern websites specifically for high-ticket dental clinics ‚Äî implants, aligners, veneers.

I've created a free homepage preview for your clinic.
Can I send it to your WhatsApp? It's just a 10-second look.

[Get WhatsApp number]

[Send preview immediately]

templates.title: üìû Follow-Up Call (After Preview Sent)
templates.use_case: Confirm they received and get feedback
templates.content:
Doctor, did you get a chance to see the preview I sent?

[Wait for feedback]

[If positive:]
Great! I can create the full homepage.
Would you prefer a premium white style or modern blue dental theme?

[Lead into package discussion]

templates.title: üéØ Urgency Close
templates.content:
Doctor, I have 2 clinic projects starting this week.

I can only take 1 more this month.
If you want me to work on yours, shall I reserve the slot?

templates.title: üéØ Value Close
templates.content:
Doctor, here's what happens:

‚ùå Generic website ‚Üí Patients go to competitor
‚úÖ Premium high-ticket site ‚Üí Patients book consultation

Your competitors are already doing this.
Shall we make sure you don't lose patients?

templates.title: üéØ Time-Limited Discount
templates.content:
Doctor, I'm giving 15% off for clinics who start this week.

Growth package becomes ‚Çπ29,750 (instead of ‚Çπ35,000).

Shall I lock this price for you?

templates.title: üß† Doctor Psychology
templates.content:
DOCTOR'S DAY:
‚Ä¢ Morning OPD
‚Ä¢ Afternoon procedures
‚Ä¢ Evening OPD
‚Ä¢ Family time
‚Ä¢ Emergency calls
‚Ä¢ Clinic management

‚úÖ NO REPLY ‚â† REJECTION
‚úÖ They are just BUSY

Most deals close:
‚Üí 9-11 PM (night)
‚Üí 7-9 AM (morning)
‚Üí Next day
‚Üí Even 3-5 days later

üìä REALITY CHECK:
‚Ä¢ 20-30% clients reply
‚Ä¢ 5-10% convert
‚Ä¢ Rest reply 7-10 days later

DON'T PANIC ‚Äî Stay consistent!

templates.title: üö´ NEVER Do This
templates.content:
‚ùå NEVER build full homepage before payment
‚ùå NEVER give more than preview PNG
‚ùå NEVER design extra pages for free
‚ùå NEVER skip asking for advance (40%)
‚ùå NEVER look desperate

‚úÖ ONLY start work after payment
‚úÖ ONLY give preview as bait
‚úÖ ONLY follow-up professionally
‚úÖ ONLY show confidence

REMEMBER:
Even 1 deal = ‚Çπ20k-‚Çπ60k
Your time is valuable!

templates.title: üìÖ Follow-Up Schedule
templates.content:
EXACT TIMING:

‚è±Ô∏è 2 hours ‚Üí First reminder
üåÖ Next morning ‚Üí Second message
‚è≥ 48 hours ‚Üí Clarification offer
üóìÔ∏è Day 4-5 ‚Üí Soft close
üìÅ Day 7-10 ‚Üí Archive message

üìû WHEN TO CALL:
‚Ä¢ After 24-48h if they've seen messages
‚Ä¢ When they said "call later"
‚Ä¢ When they replied positively but went silent

KEEP IT SHORT:
Doctors prefer 1-2 minute calls!

templates.title: üí° Success Mindset
templates.content:
YOUR POWER:
‚úÖ Fast design skills
‚úÖ Good templates
‚úÖ Professional communication
‚úÖ Understanding doctor psychology

YOUR ROUTINE:
‚Ä¢ Find 4-5 clinics (night)
‚Ä¢ Make 4-5 previews (night)
‚Ä¢ Call/message (morning)
‚Ä¢ Follow-up (throughout week)

SUCCESS FORMULA:
Many leads + Consistency + Good previews
= ‚Çπ20k-‚Çπ60k deals

Even if 9 ignore you,
1 deal pays for all effort!

type_a.characteristics: Know they need one but delaying
type_a.approach: Handle everything - design, content, photos, hosting

type_b.characteristics: Best target - premium clinic with poor online presence
type_b.approach: Show contrast between clinic quality and website quality

type_c.approach: Focus on specific high-ticket treatment pages

premium.target_client: Type C or high-end Type B

best_contact_times.avoid: Morning OPD, afternoon procedures, evening OPD
